text.section: An applicant who otherwise qualifies for a license is entitled to be examined as provided in this section.

section.section: The Board shall give examinations to applicants.
The Board may give reexaminations to applicants who fail all or part of an examination.

text.section: The Board shall notify each qualified applicant of the time and place of examination.
Except as otherwise provided under this subtitle, the Board shall determine the subjects, scope, form, and passing score for examinations given under this subtitle.

section.section: An applicant may retake an examination or a failed section of an examination after paying a reexamination fee set by the Board.

An applicant who fails two reexaminations may retake the examination only if the applicant:
Retakes the entire examination;
Pays the full examination fee; and
Completes an education program that the Board requires.
